channel.title: Will RS2007 be free?
channel.description: Hey guys I quit this community if you haven't noticed if you even remember me but I came back to ask you guys one question since there are the most intelligent runescape discussions I can find on mopar. Do you ever think runescape 2007 will be free and not require membership as I would like to play but do not feel like paying 8 dollars a month. I was around level 70 on 2007 since I bought membership upon it's release and got myself items such as rune scimitar and others but haven't since. Thanks for the feedback.

item.title: Will RS2007 be free?
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

I’m sure it will be free to play in 1 year.

Read full topic

item.title: Will RS2007 be free?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“thakillah, post:8, topic:533894”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=652689.msg4373236#msg4373236 date=1381356269]

with the game being extremely easy to make cash in, you could easily play to make money and use the money to pay for the membership.

literally a few hours of grinding or flipping can make enough money to pay for a membership.
[/quote]tell me how?

Use the money you make to buy bonds…

Sorry I don’t know much about bonds but… How much are “bonds” And where can i buy them.[/quote]

You can buy them on RS3 in game from other players for RS3 gold. Which will give you 14 days members. 14 days on OSRS = 2mill gp = 20mill RS3 gp… resulting in another bond. Thus, free membership for life.

Read full topic
